Headline: Front-End Engineer
Summary: I am a proactive and detail-oriented front-end developer with a strong focus on building clean, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces. Proficient in modern web technologies such as React, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript, I specialize in implementing dynamic UI behaviors, managing state effectively, and optimizing performance across devices.\nMy approach to development emphasizes clarity, maintainability, and user experience. I am experienced in solving complex UI challenges—ranging from interactive map components to drag-and-drop systems—while ensuring cross-browser and mobile compatibility. I’m comfortable working with design constraints, debugging at a low level, and integrating feedback into iterative improvements.\nIn team settings, I communicate clearly, manage scope responsibly, and prioritize solutions that align with project timelines and user needs. I consistently seek to balance practicality with precision, delivering functional and scalable codebases.
